Description:
The source code uses comment styles or formats that are
					inconsistent or do not follow expected standards for the
					product.

Extended_Description.xhtml:p: This issue makes it more difficult to maintain the product due to insufficient legibility, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities.  It also might make it easier to introduce vulnerabilities.

Submission.Submission_Comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
